summary: A desperate man tries to find out why his beloved left him years ago.
cast: Ralph Fiennes|Stephen Rea|Julianne Moore|Heather-Jay Jones|James Bolam|Ian Hart|Sam Bould|Cyril Shaps|Penny Morrell|Simon Fisher-Turner|Jason Isaacs|Deborah Findlay|Nicholas Hewetson|Jack McKenzie|Claire Ashton|Jeremy Caleb Johnson|Anthony Maddalena|Nic Main
title: El fin del romance
